about.title: About Me
about.content:
I'm HaRuki from Japan.
I studied at Iwate University while playing Division 1 soccer. After college, I moved to Canada, and had been working as a Software Engineer for 3 years at several startups, such as NextUI.
Now, I am back in Japan.

nextui.title: NextUI
nextui.description: Experienced a startup launch when the company joined the <YCLink>Y Combinator</YCLink> Summer Batch 2024.

sansui.title: SanS-UI
sansui.description: My friend and I are creating a UI library for Svelte 5.
